title: Eddie Condon - Dixieland All-Stars (1939-46) Decca
description:
EDDIE CONDON - DIXIELAND ALL-STARS

Eddie Condon And His Chicagoans
Max Kaminsky (tp), Brad Gowans (vtb), Pee Wee Russell (cl), Bud Freeman (ts), Joe Sullivan (p), Eddie Condon (g), Clyde Newcombe (b), Dave Tough (d); August 11, 1939

1. There'll Be Some Changes Made
2. Nobody's Sweetheart
3. Friar's Point Shuffle
4. Someday, Sweetheart

Eddie Condon And His Orchestra
Max Kaminsky, Billy Butterfield, Bobby Hackett (tp), Jack teagarden (tb), Ernie Caceres (bs), Gene Schroeder (p), Eddie Condon (g), Bob Haggart (b), George Wettling (d), Lee Wiley (vcl 6); December 12, 1944

5. When Your Lover Has Gone
6. Wherever There's Love

Same session
Add Pee Wee Russell (cl); Omit Kaminsky & Hackett (tp) on track 8; Teagarden (vcl) on track 7

7. Impromptu Ensemble No. 1
8. 'Swonderful

Eddie Condon And His Orchestra
Same personnel as previous session
Lee Wiley (vcl 9 & 11), Teagarden (vcl 10 & 12); December 14, 1944

9. Someone To Watch Over Me
10. The Sheik Of Araby
11. The Man I Love
12. Somebody Loves Me

Eddie Condon And His Orchestra
Yank Lawson (tp), Lou McGarity (tb), Edmond Hall (cl), Joe Dixon (bs), Joe Bushkin (p), Eddie Condon (g), Sid Weiss (b), George Wettling (d); May 17, 1945

13. I'll Build A Stairway To Paradise

Eddie Condon And His Orchestra
Max Kaminsky (tp), Lou McGarity (tb), Joe Dixon (cl), Jess Stacy (p), Eddie Condon (g), Jack Lesberg (b), Johnny Blowers (d); June 14, 1945

14. My One And Only

Same session
Billy Butterfield replaces Max Kaminsky (tp)

15. Oh, Lady Be Good

Eddie Condon And His Orchestra
Wild Bill Davison (cnt), Brad Gowans (vtb), Tony Parenti (cl), Gene Schroeder (p), Eddie Condon (g), Jack Lesberg (b), Dave Tough (d); March 27, 1946

16. Swanee
17. Farewell Blues

Same session
Max Kaminsky, Billy Butterfield (tp), Lou McGarity (tb), Brad Gowans (vtb), Joe Dixon (cl), Bud Freeman (ts), Joe Bushkin (p), Eddie Condon (g), Jack lesberg (b), Dave Tough (d)

19. (I've Got A Woman, Crazy For Me) She's Funny That Way

Same session
Billy Butterfield (tp), Joe Dixon (cl), Bud Freeman (ts), Joe Bushkin (p), Eddie Condon (g), Jack Lesberg (b), DaveTough (d)

20. Stars Fell On Alabama

1994 MCA/Decca
